explains: adj. 脂肪的；肥胖的；多脂肪的；脂肪过多的
wordGroup: fatty alcohol 脂肪醇；脂肪族醇；高级醇
unsaturated fatty acid 不饱和脂肪酸
fatty acid ester 脂肪酸酯
free fatty acid 游离脂肪酸；自由脂肪酸
saturated fatty acid 饱和脂肪酸，去油
fatty amine 脂肪胺；脂肪族胺
essential fatty acid 必需脂肪酸
volatile fatty acid 挥发性脂肪酸
higher fatty acid [化]高级脂肪酸
fatty substance 脂肪物质，脂肪性物质
sucrose fatty acid ester 蔗糖脂肪酸酯
fatty acid oxidation 脂肪酸氧化

sentences.en: I'm trying to keep off fatty foods.
sentences.cn: 我尽量不吃高脂肪食物。

sentences.en: Many see breakfast as a big opportunity, and not just for fatty food.
sentences.cn: 许多人将早餐视为一个巨大的机会，而不仅仅是高脂肪食物。

sentences.en: They eat too many fatty and sugary foods, but they are not eating enough to be fat.
sentences.cn: 他们吃了太多含脂肪和糖的食物，但他们吃的还不够他们变胖。
